content: this legal document discusses the division of a property located in castelfidardo italy between two parties referred to as mrs bt and mrs bl the property includes apartments a cellar a storage room and a garage the document outlines the cadastral area cadastral income and boundaries of each unit both parties acknowledge their joint ownership and responsibilities for construction and renovation they agree to divide the property equally with each party receiving specific units the value of each share is stated as 82000 euros the document also includes some omitted information
